ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:49:29 [Issue ID 4000-922496] urn:comicvine:4000-922496 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/922496 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 22:31:12. [Issue ID 922496]
ComicInfo.Summary: Catfish's daily grind of "enhancing" poultry comes to a halt when he is accidentally tripped up by a loose chicken, causing him to fall victim to his own process. What proportions of his that were once human are now beyond anything normal. Add villainous corporate and military big wigs, a roller-skating weapon-toting chick named Kitten Kaboodle, a gang of tattooed babies, and there's still that enormous beach monster And what you have is MONDO, in all its raging glory!
ComicInfo.Title: Meekaholic
